about_the_game:
Introducing a new game mode for Succubus - Roguelike mode!

Visit the Elysian Fields and make them flow with blood!


Wake up in the peaceful Elysian Fields and start a bloody massacre, traversing them in any direction, unlocking new powers and increasingly stronger weapons.
Visually stunning locations change before your eyes, generating a random appearance of the location, which makes each game different.

Infinite possibilities


For the first time in Succubus, you gain the opportunity to move around a truly open world.
Will you improve your performance this time by starting the game with stronger weapons and skills?
Or maybe you'll keep your previous set, but this time you'll try to beat the BOSS?
Decide for yourself how you want to have fun on the Elysian Fields!

Character development


Unlock new character skins and random skills which will give you a better, more effective start.
Use weapons and upgrades unlocked during the game that will strengthen the heroine and give you a better chance of surviving endless waves of enemies.

New weapon


Can there be a more beautiful way to cause massacre than running into a crowd with a lawnmower?
We're putting a brand new weapon in your hands that will help you chop your enemies to pieces.
But not so fast! First you have to make the effort to unlock it!

Is that's all? Of course not. The Elysian Fields hide many secrets that you must discover for yourself.

Feature list:

- Roguelike mode
- New powerful weapon
- New World, Elysian Fields
- New powers and challenges
- Ranked mode
- Character development
- Random Bosses
- A new type of AI
- Infinite replayability

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Succubus - Elysian Fields

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 /11
  • Processor: i5-6500, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 460 (or equivalent with at least 4GB of memory)
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5-8600, Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060, RX 5700 (with at least 6GB of memory)
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Play endlessly in visually beautiful locations in a new game mode - Rogulike mode!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Traditional Chinese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
